additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: YOUR MALTESERS CHOCOLATES ARE MADE OF THE FINEST FOOD INGREDIENTS. THEY SHOULD REACH YOU FRESH AND IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. IF YOU ARE NOT SATISFIED IN ANY WAY, PLEASE CALL 1800 245 455 IN AUSTRALIA OR 0800 444 443 IN NEW ZEALAND. ALTERNATIVELY, JUST RETURN THE UNUSED PORTION PLUS PACKAGING AND TELL US WHERE AND WHEN YOU BOUGHT THEM.
